overview: A boy made of paper named Carta has been traveling alone in a cardboard box he calls home. Gusts of wind constantly sweep it from place to place but the repetition of a solo routine bores him. One day, the box is separated from Carta in the middle of a cramped city. He then meets a strange, ragtag group of friends who offer to help him get back to his home. As they venture up an alley to reach Cartaâ€™s box, they explore acts of friendship that fascinate Carta who never having experienced life among others begins to enjoy their company.
title: Somewhere I Belong
